activities: Crowdmatrix FX, LLC collects personal information from users who install the mobile application, agree to the terms of use and privacy policy, and create an account, to allow the users to participate in a light show during a live musical performance. Crowdmatrix also shares the users personal information, with the user's authorization, to the artists performing at the live musical concerts to allow the artists to communicate with the users to offer giveaways and notify users of upcoming concert dates.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Email addresses, age, geo-location, manually processed data
recoursemech: Crowdmatrix uses an outside arbitration mechanism, the American Arbitration Association, ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, that agrees to hear each complaint in compliance with the Frameworks.
